import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, Card, Button, ListGroup, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/shop/shop.action' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' const ProductScreen = ({ history, match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history.push(`/cart/${match.params.id}?qty=${qty}`) } return (
{product.name}
Go Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} description: {product.description} price ${product.price} Status {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( ))} )} )}
) } export default ProductScreen
